verses.verse: I will stand <S%H5975><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> my watch, <S%H4931><s%> and set <S%H3320><s%> me upon <S%H5921><s%> the tower, <S%H4692><s%> and will watch <S%H6822><s%> to see <S%H7200><s%> what <S%H4100><s%> he will say <S%H1696><s%> unto me, and what <S%H4100><s%> I shall answer <S%H7725><s%> when <S%H5921><s%> I am reproved. <S%H8433><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> me, and said, <S%H559><s%> Write <S%H3789><s%> the vision, <S%H2377><s%> and make it plain <S%H874><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> tables, <S%H3871><s%> that <S%H4616><s%> he may run <S%H7323><s%> that readeth <S%H7121><s%> it.

For <S%H3588><s%> the vision <S%H2377><s%> is yet <S%H5750><s%> for an appointed time, <S%H4150><s%> but at the end <S%H7093><s%> it shall speak, <S%H6315><s%> and not <S%H3808><s%> lie: <S%H3576><s%> though <S%H518><s%> it tarry, <S%H4102><s%> wait <S%H2442><s%> for it; because <S%H3588><s%> it will surely come, <S%H935><s%> <S%H935><s%> it will not <S%H3808><s%> tarry. <S%H309><s%>

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> his soul <S%H5315><s%> which is lifted up <S%H6075><s%> is not upright <S%H3474><s%> <S%H3808><s%> in him: but the just <S%H6662><s%> shall live <S%H2421><s%> by his faith. <S%H530><s%>

Yea <S%H637><s%> also, because <S%H3588><s%> he transgresseth <S%H898><s%> by wine, <S%H3196><s%> he is a proud <S%H3093><s%> man, <S%H1397><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> keepeth at home, <S%H5115><s%> who <S%H834><s%> enlargeth <S%H7337><s%> his desire <S%H5315><s%> as hell, <S%H7585><s%> and is as death, <S%H4194><s%> and cannot <S%H3808><s%> be satisfied, <S%H7646><s%> but gathereth <S%H622><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> him all <S%H3605><s%> nations, <S%H1471><s%> and heapeth <S%H6908><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> him all <S%H3605><s%> people: <S%H5971><s%>

Shall not <S%H3808><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> take up <S%H5375><s%> a parable <S%H4912><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> him, and a taunting <S%H4426><s%> proverb <S%H2420><s%> against him, and say, <S%H559><s%> Woe <S%H1945><s%> to him that increaseth <S%H7235><s%> that which is not <S%H3808><s%> his! how long? <S%H5704><s%> <S%H4970><s%> and to him that ladeth <S%H3513><s%> <S%H5921><s%> himself with thick clay! <S%H5671><s%>

Shall they not <S%H3808><s%> rise up <S%H6965><s%> suddenly <S%H6621><s%> that shall bite <S%H5391><s%> thee, and awake <S%H3364><s%> that shall vex <S%H2111><s%> thee, and thou shalt be <S%H1961><s%> for booties <S%H4933><s%> unto them?

Because <S%H3588><s%> thou <S%H859><s%> hast spoiled <S%H7997><s%> many <S%H7227><s%> nations, <S%H1471><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the remnant <S%H3499><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> shall spoil <S%H7997><s%> thee; because of men's <S%H120><s%> blood, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1818><s%> and for the violence <S%H2555><s%> of the land, <S%H776><s%> of the city, <S%H7151><s%> and of all <S%H3605><s%> that dwell <S%H3427><s%> therein.

Woe <S%H1945><s%> to him that coveteth <S%H1214><s%> an evil <S%H7451><s%> covetousness <S%H1215><s%> to his house, <S%H1004><s%> that he may set <S%H7760><s%> his nest <S%H7064><s%> on high, <S%H4791><s%> that he may be delivered <S%H5337><s%> from the power <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3709><s%> of evil! <S%H7451><s%>

Thou hast consulted <S%H3289><s%> shame <S%H1322><s%> to thy house <S%H1004><s%> by cutting off <S%H7096><s%> many <S%H7227><s%> people, <S%H5971><s%> and hast sinned <S%H2398><s%> against thy soul. <S%H5315><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> the stone <S%H68><s%> shall cry out <S%H2199><s%> of the wall, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7023><s%> and the beam <S%H3714><s%> out of the timber <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6086><s%> shall answer <S%H6030><s%> it.
Woe <S%H1945><s%> to him that buildeth <S%H1129><s%> a town <S%H5892><s%> with blood, <S%H1818><s%> and establisheth <S%H3559><s%> a city <S%H7151><s%> by iniquity! <S%H5766><s%>

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> is it not <S%H3808><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> <S%H854><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%> that the people <S%H5971><s%> shall labor <S%H3021><s%> in the very <S%H1767><s%> fire, <S%H784><s%> and the people <S%H3816><s%> shall weary <S%H3286><s%> themselves for very <S%H1767><s%> vanity? <S%H7385><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> shall be filled <S%H4390><s%> <S%H853><s%> with the knowledge <S%H1847><s%> of the glory <S%H3519><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> as the waters <S%H4325><s%> cover <S%H3680><s%> <S%H5921><s%> the sea. <S%H3220><s%>

Woe <S%H1945><s%> unto him that giveth his neighbor drink, <S%H8248><s%> <S%H7453><s%> that puttest <S%H5596><s%> thy bottle <S%H2573><s%> to him, and makest him drunken <S%H7937><s%> also, <S%H637><s%> that <S%H4616><s%> thou mayest look <S%H5027><s%> on <S%H5921><s%> their nakedness! <S%H4589><s%>

Thou art filled <S%H7646><s%> with shame <S%H7036><s%> for glory: <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3519><s%> drink <S%H8354><s%> thou <S%H859><s%> also, <S%H1571><s%> and let thy foreskin be uncovered: <S%H6188><s%> the cup <S%H3563><s%> of the LORD's <S%H3068><s%> right hand <S%H3225><s%> shall be turned <S%H5437><s%> unto <S%H5921><s%> thee, and shameful spewing <S%H7022><s%> shall be on <S%H5921><s%> thy glory. <S%H3519><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> the violence <S%H2555><s%> of Lebanon <S%H3844><s%> shall cover <S%H3680><s%> thee, and the spoil <S%H7701><s%> of beasts, <S%H929><s%> which made them afraid, <S%H2865><s%> because of men's <S%H120><s%> blood, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1818><s%> and for the violence <S%H2555><s%> of the land, <S%H776><s%> of the city, <S%H7151><s%> and of all <S%H3605><s%> that dwell <S%H3427><s%> therein.

What <S%H4100><s%> profiteth <S%H3276><s%> the graven image <S%H6459><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> the maker <S%H3335><s%> thereof hath graven <S%H6458><s%> it; the molten image, <S%H4541><s%> and a teacher <S%H3384><s%> of lies, <S%H8267><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> the maker <S%H3335><s%> of his work <S%H3336><s%> trusteth <S%H982><s%> therein, <S%H5921><s%> to make <S%H6213><s%> dumb <S%H483><s%> idols? <S%H457><s%>

Woe <S%H1945><s%> unto him that saith <S%H559><s%> to the wood, <S%H6086><s%> Awake; <S%H6974><s%> to the dumb <S%H1748><s%> stone, <S%H68><s%> Arise, <S%H5782><s%> it <S%H1931><s%> shall teach! <S%H3384><s%> Behold, <S%H2009><s%> it <S%H1931><s%> is laid over <S%H8610><s%> with gold <S%H2091><s%> and silver, <S%H3701><s%> and there is no <S%H369><s%> breath <S%H7307><s%> at all <S%H3605><s%> in the midst <S%H7130><s%> of it.
But the LORD <S%H3068><s%> is in his holy <S%H6944><s%> temple: <S%H1964><s%> let all <S%H3605><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> keep silence <S%H2013><s%> before <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> him.
